name: Impact of COVID pandemic on 2020 earned income of U.S. residing employed doctoral scientists and engineers: by employment type and sector of employment
description: Impact of COVID pandemic on 2020 earned income of U.S. residing employed doctoral scientists and engineers: by employment type and sector of employment

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: employment_type_and_sector_of_employment
variableMeasured.description: Employment type and sector of employment hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_decreased_income_change_median_in_dollars
variableMeasured.description: Decreased Income Change Median In Dollars

variableMeasured.name: field_increased_income_change_median_in_dollars
variableMeasured.description: Increased Income Change Median In Dollars

specialValues.D: suppressed to avoid disclosure of confidential information

notes: Median earned income change estimates are rounded to nearest $1,000. Percentages are rounded to the nearest 0.1%. Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. Residence location is based on reported living location on 1 February 2021.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, Survey of Doctorate Recipients: 2021.
